title: 209A-Viking Legends: Bloodlines
itunes:title: 209A-Viking Legends: Bloodlines
description:
A Norse saga in the truest sense of the word, this story follows one family through changing times of the Middle Ages. There are cursed swords, Viking love triangles, and why throwing stinky socks at a person whose only desire is to punch you in the face is a terrible idea.

The creature is the Yule goat, who hasn't been burned down yet! Maybe!


The Yule goat's twitter: https://myths.link/goat

The Myths and Legends store: https://myths.link/store

Membership: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

Episode post (and disclaimer): https://myths.link/209a

--

Sponsors:

BetterHelp: Sign up with BetterHelp and you can be talking to a licensed professional counselor in under 48 hours. Go to http://betterhelp.com/myths to get 10% off your first month.

Athletic Greens: Check out http://www.athleticgreens.com/legends to get a free year supply of Vitamin D and 5 free travel packs today!

--

Music:

"Down to the Wire" by Lance Conrad

"Voyage to America" by Lance Conrad

"Big River Run" by Blue Dot Sessions

"The Idle Eyes" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Slapstick" by Blue Dot Sessions

"Unseen" by Michael Vignola

"Stumbling" by Michael Vignola

Support the show: https://www.mythpodcast.com/membership

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
